function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High rate of virus positivity from floor swab samples in ICU and GW, indicating contamination of the built environment.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection for medical staff, patients, and visitors.","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of floor surfaces, implementation of shoe sole disinfection protocols, and improved air flow and ventilation systems.","Technologies":"UV disinfection systems, air purifiers, and automated floor cleaning robots.","People":"Medical staff, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"High rate of virus positivity on surfaces frequently touched by medical staff or patients, such as computer mice, trash cans, handrails, and doorknobs.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of frequently touched surfaces, implementation of hand hygiene practices, and proper waste management protocols.","Technologies":"Surface disinfection sprays, antimicrobial coatings, and touchless fixtures.","People":"Medical staff, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"High rate of virus positivity on patient masks due to exhaled droplets and oral secretions.","Impact":"Risk of infection from handling and improper disposal of contaminated masks.","Mitigation":"Proper disinfection of masks before disposal and implementation of mask handling protocols.","Technologies":"UV sterilization chambers, ozone disinfection systems, and thermal disinfection machines.","People":"Medical staff, waste management personnel.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."}]}
